description: Miura Kento is a student in Sawako`s class during second year whom sits next to her. When Sawako befriends Miura, Kazehaya becomes jealous of him as a potential rival for Sawako. He is interested in girls, particularly Sawako and tries to persuade her to give up on Kazehaya, suggesting that she is burdening him, because he believes that Sawako`s feelings for Kazehaya are unrequited. His interference with Sawako and Kazehaya`s developing relationship irritates Ayane.
name: Miura Kento
